sentences.en: ...pumps that circulate the fuel around in the engine.
sentences.cn: …使燃料在发动机内循环的压泵。

sentences.en: Age diminishes the heart's ability to pump harder and faster under exertion.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增加，人在消耗体力时心脏的输血能力和输血速度会有所减弱。

sentences.en: Both springs in the fuel pump were broken.
sentences.cn: 燃料泵里的两个弹簧都断了。

sentences.en: He ran in every five minutes to pump me about the case.
sentences.cn: 他每隔五分钟就跑来追问我这件事。

sentences.en: I saw him pumping up at the gym.
sentences.cn: 我看到他在体育馆里积极地锻炼

sentences.en: I tried to pump up my back tyre.
sentences.cn: 我试图给后胎打气。

sentences.en: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.cn: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.en: Pump the tire up hard before going out on the road.
sentences.cn: 在出去上路之前,要把轮胎打足气.

sentences.en: pump up a tire.
sentences.cn: 给轮胎打气

sentences.en: She washed her face at the pump in front of the inn.
sentences.cn: 她在客栈前的水泵旁洗了洗脸。

sentences.en: Stop trying to pump information out of me.
sentences.cn: 别再追问我消息了。

sentences.en: The fire department is still pumping floodwater out of the cellars.
sentences.cn: 消防人员仍在用水泵从地下室里往外抽积水。

sentences.en: The lively debate really pumped us up.
sentences.cn: 活跃的辩论着实使我们很兴奋

sentences.en: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.cn: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

sentences.en: The pump is actuated by a belt driven by an electric motor.
sentences.cn: 这台抽水机由电动机皮带驱动.

sentences.en: The teacher drew an analogy between the human heart and a pump.
sentences.cn: 老师打了个比喻，把人的心脏比作水泵。

sentences.en: There is a manual pump to get rid of the water.
sentences.cn: 有一只手摇水泵用来排水。

sentences.en: They find it difficult to pump themselves up for the games.
sentences.cn: 他们感到要为自己加油打气，自信满满地去打比赛并不容易。

sentences.en: They removed the pump out of the room.
sentences.cn: 他们将这台泵从室内搬出.

sentences.en: This water is forced into the boiler by the feed pump.
sentences.cn: 用水泵将水压入锅炉.

sentences.en: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.cn: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.en: We couple the pump with the engine.
sentences.cn: 我们把水泵与引擎连接起来.

sentences.en: We pump water from the well for daily use.
sentences.cn: 我们从井里抽水以供日用.

sentences.en: We were able to pump clean water from several of the wells.
sentences.cn: 我们能从几口井里抽出干净的水来。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 泵效；泵效率；水泵效率
泵耗电力，泵浦功率；泵功率
&I{【体育运动】} 热忠于健身运动：积极地参加一项健身活动

trans.tran_cn: 泵，加油泵，帆布鞋，女士浅口鞋，抽吸
trans.tran_en: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something

trans.tran_cn: 输送，涌出，快速摇动，快速运动，不停地追问
trans.tran_en: To pump a liquid or gas in a particular direction means to force it to flow in that direction using a pump
to bring a supply of water, oil etc to the surface from under the ground
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump
